timeline.message: Fix validatesRunner tests configuration in spark module

[BEAM-9205] Add ValidatesRunner annotation to the MetricsPusherTest class (not only on the methods) and remove unneeded MetricsPusherTest inside spark structured streaming runner (because this runner uses the VR common test)
[BEAM-9205] Fix validatesRunner tests configuration in spark module
